summary: The diff only shows a modification to project_state.json (a metadata/state tracking file), with no changes to any actual frontend component files such as ContactSection. REQ-9 requires updating contact details (address, phone, email) in the ContactSection component, but no such component file was modified in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the contact details displayed in the ContactSection component (studio address, phone number, email, and any other contact info fields) to the new values provided by the user.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only a change to project_state.json. No ContactSection component or related frontend file was modified to update the displayed contact information text values.
